control.description-key: Reusable Matrix Control for Many-to-Many Relationships

property-set.name: displayColumns
property-set.description-key: Columns to display in the matrix

property.name: entityId
property.description-key: The id of the current record

property.name: entityName
property.description-key: The logical name of the current record type

property.name: rowParentField
property.description-key: Lookup field in row entity pointing to parent record

property.name: columnParentField
property.description-key: Lookup field in column entity pointing to parent record

property.name: rowEntityName
property.description-key: Logical name of row entity

property.name: columnEntityName
property.description-key: Logical name of column entity

property.name: junctionEntityName
property.description-key: Logical name of junction entity

property.name: rowIdField
property.description-key: Primary key field for row entity

property.name: rowDisplayField
property.description-key: Display field for row entity

property.name: columnIdField
property.description-key: Primary key field for column entity

property.name: columnDisplayField
property.description-key: Display field for column entity

property.name: junctionIdField
property.description-key: Primary key field for junction entity

property.name: junctionRowField
property.description-key: Foreign key field to row entity

property.name: junctionColumnField
property.description-key: Foreign key to column entity

property.name: debugMode
property.description-key: Enable debug mode for detailed logging and diagnostics

property.name: bulkSelectionTooltip
property.description-key: Tooltip text for bulk selection info icon

property.name: columnParentAttrField
property.description-key: Lookup field in column entity pointing to parent in hierarchy chain

property.name: columnVersionField
property.description-key: Field for determining latest/ordering in chain

property.name: pageSize
property.description-key: Number of items to load initially default 20

property.name: enableBatchSave
property.description-key: Enable batch save operations default true

property.name: parentEntityId
property.description-key: The id of the parent record (optional)

property.name: parentEntityName
property.description-key: The logical name of the parent record type (optional)
